checker back 2 back

these photos are from 2022 when my favorite band in detroit was still a 3 piece. They asked me to shoot some photos for them over the weekend cause they had three shows on back 2 back days. I'm so happy to know all of these folks and so grateful to still be taking pictures of them on their rise thru the musical ranks in our fine city.

shot on canon 5D mkiii
